column3: str

Regitt has a twinkle in his eye and a request on his lips.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with Shigitt.
Shigitt has tasked you with crafting four core components, then delivering the completed items to Regitt.
Speak with Shigitt.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),9))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Regitt</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),10))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Regitt</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),11))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Regitt</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),8))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Regitt</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),12))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Regitt</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),13))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Regitt</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),14))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Regitt</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),15))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Regitt</If><Else/></If></If></If></If></If></If></If></If>.

Our Rolling Tankards will be the culmination of much careful planning and applied theory, which is why I want to entrust the most vital elements to a master artisan of proven quality. ...Aye, that would be you!
There's much to be done, but Shigitt can give you the details─and the resources─you need to proceed. We're counting on you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>!
Ready to make some core components for the Tankard, then? Glad to have you aboard.

Right, so what I need from you is four tempered nozzles, highly resistant to heat─they'll be used in the fuel injection device for emergency escapes, so we'll want to be sure they work. Start with these materials, and let me know if you need more.

Right, so what I need from you is four padded cushions for the tank's interior─we need to make sure the automaton inside is properly protected from impacts. Start with these materials, and let me know if you need more.

Right, so what I need from you is four durable tracks of rubber for the wheels─when the going gets rough, we'll want the tank to keep rolling. Start with these ingredients, and let me know if you need more.
Once you're satisfied, take what you've made straight to Regitt, and he'll pass it on to the tank engineers. They're eager to put everything together!
You've got everything you need, so all that remains is the application of some elbow grease!
You've got everything you need, so all that remains is the application of some elbow grease!
You've got everything you need, so all that remains is the application of some elbow grease!
Out of materials already? ...Fine. I suppose I can spare some from the stores.
Out of materials already? ...Fine. I suppose I can spare some from the stores.
Out of ingredients already? ...Fine. I suppose I can spare some from the stores.
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! What have you brought me!?

Now this is some fine work...very fine indeed! With parts of this quality, our tanks will perform even better than Watts could've imagined! Lali-ho-ho-ho, I am moved to tears! Flabbergasted! Duly impressed!
...Uh, not that I'm trying to flatter you so you'll accept an even more difficult task next time or anything like that! I just...know how to appreciate true artisanship! Yes!
